title: Real-Time Alerts for Patient Health Monitoring
summary: As a home-care nurse, I want to receive real-time alerts about my patients' health metrics so that I can quickly respond to any anomalies and ensure their well-being.

title: Secure Communication Platform for Caregivers
summary: As a home-care nurse, I want a secure communication platform within ALFRED so that I can easily and safely connect with my patients and their families, ensuring timely updates and support.

title: User-Friendly Health Metrics Dashboard for Caregivers
summary: As a home-care nurse, I want a user-friendly dashboard to monitor my patients' health metrics so that I can efficiently track their vital signs and intervene promptly when necessary.

title: Tailored Health Alerts for Home-Care Nurses
summary: As a home-care nurse, I want to receive tailored health alerts for my patients so that I can monitor their health status more efficiently and intervene promptly when necessary.

title: Integration with Health Data Sources for Enhanced Patient Monitoring
summary: As a home-care nurse, I want to access real-time health metrics from my patients' monitoring devices so that I can efficiently track their health status and provide timely interventions.

title: Automated Check-In Reminders for Patient Monitoring
summary: As a home-care nurse, I want automated check-in reminders for my patients so that I can efficiently monitor their health status and ensure timely intervention when necessary.

title: Video Consultation Support for Home-Care Nurses
summary: As a home-care nurse, I want to conduct video consultations with my patients through ALFRED so that I can remotely monitor their health and maintain a personal connection, especially for those who are socially isolated.

title: Remote Health Monitoring
summary: As a home-care nurse, I want to efficiently monitor my patients' health metrics through ALFRED so that I can detect any changes early and provide timely interventions.

title: Caregiver Engagement Analytics for Enhanced Patient Support
summary: As a home-care nurse, I want access to analytics on my engagement with patients so that I can better understand their needs and ensure timely interventions.

title: User Training for Caregivers on Effective ALFRED Utilization
summary: As a home-care nurse, I want to receive training on how to effectively utilize ALFRED so that I can efficiently monitor my patients' health and maintain connection with those who are socially isolated.
